faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions

items.question: How can I become a driver?
items.answer: To become a driver, simply fill out the request form on our website. Our team will review your application and contact you.

items.question: What's the difference between affiliate and renter?
items.answer: Affiliate drivers work with their own vehicles, while renters use vehicles from Conduz PT.

items.question: How long does approval take?
items.answer: The approval process usually takes between 2 to 5 business days, depending on documentation availability.

items.question: Which platforms are supported?
items.answer: We work with the main transport platforms in Portugal, including Uber and Bolt.

testimonials.title: What Our Drivers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from those who are already part of Conduz PT

items.quote: Conduz PT made my life as a driver much easier. The support is excellent and the processes are very simple.
items.author: João Silva

items.quote: I've been working as a renter for 6 months and I'm very satisfied. The vehicles are well maintained and the support is constant.
items.author: Maria Santos
